title: INC MLA Patwari Did Not Say Congress Bribed People to Vote
subtitle: BJP Mumbai spokesperson Suresh Nakhua’s tweet claimed that INC MLA Patwari said that Congress bribed people to vote.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
While appealing for votes, Patwari termed the BJP “anti-poor” and said that the party does little for the marginalised, yet manages to secure votes by bribing them with cash and alcohol. During elections, he alleged that women accept Rs 200-500 as bribes and keep them in their “blouses” while the men take alcohol.

In the 2:54-minute video, Patwari can be heard saying, “एक्चुअल में क्या है ये बीजेपी गरीबो के विरोध की पार्टी है…तुम लोग समझते नहीं हो | चुनाव आता है जब ५००-२०० रुपये लेके पोलके में रख लेती है महिलाएँ | (Actually BJP is an anti-poor party..but you people don’t understand. During elections, women accept Rs 500-200 and keep it in their blouses.)”

When the women in the crowd objected to the Congress MP’s bribery allegations, he went ahead to add, “चुनाव में कांग्रेस पार्टी क्यों हरी चलो बताओ पार्षद में यहाँ…जेन्ट्स दारू पी लेते है सच कह रहा हु मैं| मेरा अनुभव है ये|मुझे डराने से कुछ नहीं होगा| (If not so then tell me why did Congress party lose in the council elections…men drink alcohol. I am speaking the truth, this is my experience. Threatening me will not achieve anything.”)
